card.text: {T}, Sacrifice an artifact: Proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

card.name: Time Sieve
card.text: {T}, Sacrifice five artifacts: Take an extra turn after this one.

card.name: Topple the Statue
card.text: Tap target permanent. If it's an artifact, destroy it. Draw a card.

card.name: Toxic Deluge
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Toxic Deluge
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, pay X life. All creatures get -X/-X until end of turn.

card.name: Trash for Treasure
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Return target artifact card from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Treasure Keeper
card.text: When Treasure Keeper dies, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card with converted mana cost 3 or less. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Put all revealed cards not cast this way on the bottom of your library in a random order.

card.name: Treasure Mage
card.text: When Treasure Mage enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card with converted mana cost 6 or greater, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Trinisphere
card.text: As long as Trinisphere is untapped, each spell that would cost less than three mana to cast costs three mana to cast. (Additional mana in the cost may be paid with any color of mana or colorless mana. For example, a spell that would cost {1}{B} to cast costs {2}{B} to cast instead.)

card.name: Tuktuk the Explorer
card.text: Haste When Tuktuk the Explorer dies, create Tuktuk the Returned, a legendary 5/5 colorless Goblin Golem artifact creature token.

card.name: Tumble Magnet
card.text: Tumble Magnet enters the battlefield with three charge counters on it. {T}, Remove a charge counter from Tumble Magnet: Tap target artifact or creature.

card.name: Twilight Mire
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {B/G}, {T}: Add {B}{B}, {B}{G}, or {G}{G}.

card.name: Twisted Abomination
card.text: {B}: Regenerate Twisted Abomination. Swampcycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Search your library for a Swamp card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.)

card.name: Ulvenwald Mysteries
card.text: Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, investigate. (Create a colorless Clue artifact token with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.") Whenever you sacrifice a Clue, create a 1/1 white Human Soldier creature token.

card.name: Unlicensed Disintegration
card.text: Destroy target creature. If you control an artifact, Unlicensed Disintegration deals 3 damage to that creature's controller.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Mine
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Power-Plant and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Power Plant
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Tower, add {C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

card.name: Urza's Tower
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. If you control an Urza's Mine and an Urza's Power-Plant, add {C}{C}{C} instead.

card.name: Valor in Akros
card.text: Whenever a creature enters the battlefield under your control, creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

card.name: Valorous Stance
card.text: Choose one — • Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. • Destroy target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

card.name: Vampire Hexmage
card.text: First strike Sacrifice Vampire Hexmage: Remove all counters from target permanent.

card.name: Vedalken Infuser
card.text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a charge counter on target artifact.

card.name: Vengevine
card.text: Haste Whenever you cast a spell, if it's the second creature spell you cast this turn, you may return Vengevine from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Veteran Explorer
card.text: When Veteran Explorer dies, each player may search their library for up to two basic land cards and put them onto the battlefield. Then each player who searched their library this way shuffles it.

card.name: Vexing Shusher
card.text: This spell can't be countered. {R/G}: Target spell can't be countered.

card.name: Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter
card.text: Flying, lifelink Sacrifice a creature: Put X +1/+1 counters on Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter, where X is the sacrificed creature's power. Remove all +1/+1 counters from Vish Kal: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn for each +1/+1 counter removed this way.

card.name: Voice of Resurgence
card.text: Whenever an opponent casts a spell during your turn or when Voice of Resurgence dies, create a green and white Elemental creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control."

card.name: Vulshok Gauntlets
card.text: Equipped creature gets +4/+2 and doesn't untap during its controller's untap step. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

card.name: Walking Ballista
card.text: Walking Ballista enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it. {4}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Walking Ballista. Remove a +1/+1 counter from Walking Ballista: It deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Weapon Surge
card.text: Target creature you control gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Overload {1}{R} (You may cast this spell for its overload cost. If you do, change its text by replacing all instances of "target" with "each.")

card.name: Weapons Trainer
card.text: Other creatures you control get +1/+0 as long as you control an Equipment.

card.name: Welding Jar
card.text: Sacrifice Welding Jar: Regenerate target artifact.

card.name: Well of Ideas
card.text: When Well of Ideas enters the battlefield, draw two cards. At the beginning of each other player's draw step, that player draws an additional card. At the beginning of your draw step, draw two additional cards.

card.name: Whisperer of the Wilds
card.text: {T}: Add {G}. Ferocious — {T}: Add {G}{G}. Activate this ability only if you control a creature with power 4 or greater.

card.name: Wooded Bastion
card.text: {T}: Add {C}. {G/W}, {T}: Add {G}{G}, {G}{W}, or {W}{W}.

card.name: Woodland Champion
card.text: Whenever one or more tokens enter the battlefield under your control, put that many +1/+1 counters on Woodland Champion.

card.name: Wound Reflection
card.text: At the beginning of each end step, each opponent loses life equal to the life they lost this turn. (Damage causes loss of life.)

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.name: Wrath of God
card.text: Destroy all creatures. They can't be regenerated.

card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.

card.name: Wurmcoil Engine
card.text: Deathtouch, lifelink When Wurmcoil Engine dies, create a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with deathtouch and a 3/3 colorless Wurm artifact creature token with lifelink.
